content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main reason for not agreeing on a price?
name: Evaluator

content: The main reason for not agreeing on a price was that I felt we were getting close to the price that I was willing to offer for the apartment, and I didn't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I didn't feel being discriminated or offended because the negotiation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner. The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, was open to negotiation and showed understanding when I expressed that I didn't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller
